About.paragraph: The goal of our application is to analyze and visualize the 2D image of objects in astrophysiscs. As images are processes, the web application will make several evaluations by symmetry detection into 3D reconstructed models. Our project will let users have a more thorough space view.

Team.name: Elizaveta Ibeme
Team.job: Project management and Implemented the 3D model by ThreeJS

Team.job: Worked on research paper, a pipeline and connect the neural network with the website
